_header: Saint Mark here in our godspel
_description: Gospel for Easter Sunday in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint Mark here in oure godspellSais vs how sum tyme bifell…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þat may we by saint martin seþat was fulfild of charite
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Maria magdalene & maria Iachobi et salomee & cetera.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: In die pasche secundum Marcum (rubric, f. 86rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.168-173.
